main event: A sighting of a 'Balloon with lights' in St. Cloud, Minnesota on August 8, 1954.
interesting points: The object was round and flashed red, orange, and white lights at one-minute intervals., The observed movement was jerky, and it traveled in a north direction at approximately 40 MPH., The sighting lasted for 1.6 minutes., The object was described as being the size of a grapefruit., The report labeled the sighting as possibly a balloon or unknown.
